title: Rashi on Hosea
text: Therefore behold I will seduce her…I will persuade or appease her to draw her after me. And what is the seduction and the leading into the wilderness?  Exile which will be like a wilderness and a draught to her, and there she will do tshuvah (return her heart) for it is better when she does My will than when she rebels against Me.”
1. Shomron is made guilty- at this point, her guilt will be revealed.
2. the pregnant women in her midst
1. Assyria will not save us- Even more say before Him that we don't want any help from man. Not from Assyria. Not from Egypt.
2. On a horse we will not ride- This refers to the assistance of Egypt that they sent horses. Like it says in Isiah 50. and we will no longer say
3. To the works of our hands- ie our gods/idols
4. Because with You- and only You rests the hope for mercy on orphans
